sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react';
import { Box, InputLabel, TextField, Grid, Select, MenuItem, Button, CircularProgress, FormControl } from '@material-ui/core';
import { Formik, FieldArray, Field } from 'formik';
import * as Yup from 'yup';
import useStyles from './useStyles';

const airports = [
    {value: 1, name: 'Istanbul Airport'}, 
    {value: 2, name:'Sabiha Airport'}
 ];
const resorts = [
    {value: 1, name: 'Sultan Ahmet'},
    {value: 2, name: 'Sirkeci'},
    {value: 3, name: 'Taksim'},
    {value: 4, name: 'Fatih'},
    {value: 5, name: 'Laleli'}
];

function NewReservationForm(): JSX.Element {
    const classes = useStyles();

    const handleSubmit = () => {console.log('submitting')};
    return (
        <>
            <Box>
                <Formik
                    initialValues={{
                        type: 0,
                        from: 0,
                        to: 0,
                        hotel: '',
                        pax: 0,
                        flightNo: '',
                        driverNote: '',
                        passengers: []
                    }}
                    validationSchema={Yup.object().shape({ 
                        type: Yup.string().required(),
                        from:  Yup.string().required(),
                        to: Yup.string().required(),
                        hotel: Yup.string().required(),
                        flightNo: Yup.string().required(),
                        driverNote: Yup.string(),
                        pax: Yup.number().min(1).max(10).default(1),
                    })}
                    onSubmit={handleSubmit}
                >   
                    {({ handleSubmit, handleChange, values, touched, errors, isSubmitting }) => (
                    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className={classes.form} noValidate>
                        <Grid container direction='column' alignItems='center'>
                            <Grid item>
                                <Grid item container className={classes.itemContainer} spacing={4}>
                                    <Grid item>
                                        <InputLabel id="type" className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            type
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <Select
                                            id="type"
                                            name="type"
                                            autoWidth
                                            displayEmpty={true}
                                            value={values.type}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            classes={{ select: classes.select }}
                                        >
                                            <MenuItem value={0}>---Select---</MenuItem>
                                            <MenuItem value={1}>Airport to Resort</MenuItem>
                                            <MenuItem value={2}>Resort to Airport</MenuItem>
                                        </Select> 
                                    </Grid>
                                    <Grid item> 
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            pax
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <Select
                                            id="pax"
                                            name="pax"
                                            autoWidth
                                            displayEmpty={true}
                                            value={values.pax}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            classes={{ select: classes.select }}
                                        >
                                            <MenuItem value={0}>---Select---</MenuItem>
                                            <MenuItem value={1}>1</MenuItem>
                                            <MenuItem value={2}>2</MenuItem>
                                        </Select>
                                    </Grid>
                                </Grid>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item >
                                <Grid item container className={classes.itemContainer} spacing={4}>
                                    <Grid item>
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            from
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <Select
                                            id="from"
                                            name="from"
                                            autoWidth
                                            displayEmpty
                                            value={values.from}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            classes={{ select: classes.select }}
                                            >
                                            <MenuItem value="" disabled>---Select---</MenuItem>
                                            {values.type === 1 ? airports.map((airport) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={airport.value}>{airport.name}</MenuItem>
                                            )): resorts.map((resort) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={resort.value}>{resort.name}</MenuItem>
                                            ))
                                            }
                                        </Select>
                                    </Grid>
                                
                                    <Grid item>
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            to
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <Select
                                            id="to"
                                            name="to"
                                            autoWidth
                                            value={values.to}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            classes={{ select: classes.select }}
                                        >
                                            <MenuItem value={0}>---Select---</MenuItem>
                                            {values.type === 2 ? airports.map((airport) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={airport.value}>{airport.name}</MenuItem>
                                            )): resorts.map((resort) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={resort.value}>{resort.name}</MenuItem>
                                            ))
                                            }
                                        </Select>
                                    </Grid>
                                </Grid>
                            </Grid>
                                    {/* <FormControl className={classes.formControl}>
                                        <InputLabel id="type" className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            type
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <Select
                                            id="type"
                                            name="type"
                                            autoWidth
                                            displayEmpty={true}
                                            value={values.type}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            classes={{ select: classes.select }}
                                            >
                                            <MenuItem value={0}>---Select---</MenuItem>
                                            <MenuItem value={1}>Airport to Resort</MenuItem>
                                            <MenuItem value={2}>Resort to Airport</MenuItem>
                                        </Select>
                                    </FormControl>
                                    <FormControl>
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            from
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <Select
                                            id="from"
                                            name="from"
                                            autoWidth
                                            value={values.from}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            classes={{ select: classes.select }}
                                            >
                                            <MenuItem value="" disabled>---Select---</MenuItem>
                                            {values.type === 1 ? airports.map((airport) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={airport.value}>{airport.name}</MenuItem>
                                            )): resorts.map((resort) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={resort.value}>{resort.name}</MenuItem>
                                            ))
                                            }
                                        </Select>
                                    </FormControl>
                                    <FormControl>
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            to
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <Select
                                            id="to"
                                            name="to"
                                            autoWidth
                                            value={values.to}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            classes={{ select: classes.select }}
                                            >
                                            <MenuItem value={0}>---Select---</MenuItem>
                                            {values.type === 2 ? airports.map((airport) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={airport.value}>{airport.name}</MenuItem>
                                            )): resorts.map((resort) => (
                                                <MenuItem value={resort.value}>{resort.name}</MenuItem>
                                            ))
                                            }
                                        </Select>
                                    </FormControl> */}
                            <Grid item container spacing={2} className={classes.itemContainer}>
                                <Grid item container spacing={2}>
                                    <Grid item>
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            hotel
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <TextField 
                                            id='hotel'
                                            name='hotel'
                                            InputProps= {{
                                                classes: { input: classes.inputs },
                                                disableUnderline: true
                                            }}
                                            value={values.hotel}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            
                                        />
                                    </Grid>
                                </Grid>
                                <Grid item container spacing={2} className={classes.itemContainer}>
                                    <Grid item>
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            flight no
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <TextField 
                                            id='flightNo'
                                            name='flightNo'
                                            InputProps= {{
                                                classes: { input: classes.inputs },
                                                disableUnderline: true
                                            }}
                                            value={values.flightNo}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                            
                                        />
                                    </Grid>
                                    <Grid item>
                                        <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                            driver note
                                        </InputLabel>
                                        <TextField 
                                            id='driverNote'
                                            name='driverNote'
                                            InputProps= {{
                                                classes: { input: classes.inputs },
                                                disableUnderline: true
                                            }}
                                            value={values.driverNote}
                                            onChange={handleChange}
                                        />
                                    </Grid>
                                </Grid>
                                <Grid item container spacing={2} className={classes.itemContainer}>
                                    <FieldArray name="passengers">
                                        {
                                            (fieldArrayProps) => {
                                                console.log('objs are: ', fieldArrayProps)
                                                const { push, remove, form } = fieldArrayProps;
                                                const { values } = form;
                                                const { pax, passengers } = values;
                                                let allPassengers = new Array(pax).fill('');
                                                return (
                                                        
                                                        <Box>
                                                            {
                                                               allPassengers.map((passenger: any, index: any) => (
                                                                    <>
                                                                    <InputLabel className={classes.inputLabel}>
                                                                        fullname
                                                                    </InputLabel><Field
                                                                        id={`passengers[${index}]`}
                                                                        name={`passengers[${index}]`}
                                                                        InputProps={{
                                                                            classes: { input: classes.inputs },
                                                                            disableUnderline: true
                                                                        }}
                                                                        // value={passengers[index]}
                                                                        // onChange={handleChange} 
                                                                        />
                                                                        {/* <Button onClick={() => {push(values.firstName)}}>+</Button> */}
                                                                    </>
                                                                ))
                                                            }
                                                        </Box>
                                                )
                                            }
                                        }
                                    </FieldArray>
                                    <Grid item>
                                        <Button size="large" type="submit" variant="contained" color="primary" className={classes.submit}>
                                            {isSubmitting ? <CircularProgress className={classes.circularProgress} /> : 'Submit'} 
                                        </Button>
                        </Grid>
                                </Grid>
                            </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </form>
                    )}
                </Formik>
            </Box>
        </>
    )
}
export default NewReservationForm;
